data.title: H.P. Lovecraft – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about H.P. Lovecraft. Browse H.P. Lovecraft’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.
data.text:
The Brotherhood of the Beast

Length: 2 hrs and 56 mins

Original Recording

A hardened archaeologist and a wealthy adventurer join forces to look into inexplicable murders in Boston. Before long, their investigation reveals a nefarious conspiracy....

5 out of 5 stars

Such a cool idea, what a great story!

For the first time ever, the H.P. Lovecraft Historical Society has produced an audio recording of all of Lovecraft's stories. These are not dramatizations like our Dark Adventure Radio Theatre - rather, this is an audiobook of the original stories....

5 out of 5 stars

Best Lovecraft Collection on Audible!

The Alchemist

By: H.P. Lovecraft

Narrated by: Josh Greenwood

Length: 22 mins

Unabridged

Overall

0 out of 5 stars 0

Performance

0 out of 5 stars 0

Story

0 out of 5 stars 0

The last of Lovecraft's youthful tales saved by its creator. For the first time, a cursed lineage appears – a motif quite frequent in Lovecraft, borrowed from Poe. It is also the writer's first approach to Gothic poetics in prose.
